name: Mission Of Hero
description: You are a soldier in an elite, special squad that was sent to carry out a secret operation to steal information from the terrorists' base.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card Storage: 370 MB available space
